item.description: "this piece of music is a place that you can go to, a kind of astral sanctum that can be visited again and again so long as you know the mysterious paths that lead to it." https://t.co/Y9KFnxdinG

item.description: ♫ My Top 5 #lastfm artists: Dmitri Shostakovich (61), George Frideric Handel (42), John Dowland (17), The Rolling Stones (16) & The Black Angels (14) via @tweeklyfm
